EmailTemplate.subject: WEBINAR: Join NCR, Progressive Grocer, Sedano’s & Sendik’s for eCommerce Insights
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Food retailing in today’s world means offering a great customer experience — whether in-store or online. What does that mean for the e-commerce solution you might’ve rushed to adopt during the pandemic? It may be time to re-evaluate that e-commerce solution and determine the best ways to drive major revenue while satisfying your customers. Join us on June 22nd at 11am ET to learn the shopper insights changing the grocery technology landscape forever, including: - How to drive major sales through an airtight online merchandising strategy - The importance of marketing through your e-commerce platform (and how to do it well) - The essential things to look for in a scalable, future-flexible e-commerce solution You’ll hear about all this and more in our upcoming, trend-packed webinar.
